p: Standard plasmids with a concentration of 10 3 and 10 2 copies/Î¼L were used to simulate co-infection of duplex and triplex viruses. In addition, we tested 82 clinical diarrhea samples collected from different hospitals in Zhejiang, China and compared them with the results of RT-PCR in the first part of material and methods, with positive and negative controls throughout the process.
